branch_method: Initialized directly from parent restart files.
comment: Primavera WP5 AMV+ experiment by CNR-ISAC
experiment: Idealized climate impact of positive 2xAMV anomaly pattern

variant_info: This experiment is a modified version of the  DCPP-C core protocol.  The DCPP-C  AMV anomaly pattern has been multiplied by 2.
